description: This file is a CMake configuration script designed to locate and configure the gstreamer-video-1.0 library within a project. It sets variables indicating whether the library is found, defines external library and include directories, and creates an imported target for the library if found.

methods.name: find_package
methods.description: Locate the specified package using CMake's module path.

methods.name: pkg_check_modules
methods.description: Check for the presence of a package using pkg-config.

methods.name: FIND_PACKAGE_HANDLE_STANDARD_ARGS
methods.description: Process standard arguments for find_package modules.

methods.name: find_library
methods.description: Locate a library in the file system.

methods.name: set_target_properties
methods.description: Set properties for a target such as location and compile options.

methods.name: add_library
methods.description: Create a new library target, here used to define an imported target.
